title: html tags in password cause issues in caldav import
body:
hi,
i have just setup a new user at my owncloud installation and there seemed to be a weird issue with his password. the user has access to the web interface. but when we tries to import his calendars via caldav to thunderbird, then he does not pass the authentication. after further investigation it seems that the user password containing html special chars ("test123>023") caused the issue.

apparently, in lib/base.php the password is going through strip_tags and what mysql comes to authenticate against is a password like "test123". when the strip_tags is removed (temporarily), the user has access to his calendars via thunderbird.
this issue was noticed with 5.0.12 and  6.0 beta 4. let me know if you need further details.

thanks in advance!

br,
leo
